Legacy Document

Inside Macintosh: Mac OS Runtime Architectures /
Preface - About This Book / Conventions Used in This Book

Command Syntax

This book uses the following syntax conventions:
literalLetter Gothic text indicates a word that must appear exactly as shown.
italicsItalics indicate a parameter that you must replace with anything that matches the parameter's definition.
[ ]Brackets indicate that the enclosed item is optional.
. . .Ellipses (. . .) indicate that the preceding item can be repeated one or more times.
|A vertical bar (|) indicates an either/or choice.
